import React,{useRef,useEffect,useState}from'react';import io from'socket.io-client';import{AppBar,Toolbar,Typography,IconButton,Button,Slider,Box}from'@mui/material';import{Brush,LayersClear}from'@mui/icons-material';import{SketchPicker}from'react-color';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const socket=io();function App(){const canvasRef=useRef(null);const contextRef=useRef(null);const drawing=useRef(false);// States for brush properties

actionStack.current=[];undoneStack.current=[];};const clearCanvas=()=>{const canvas=canvasRef.current;const context=contextRef.current;context.clearRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);};const undo=()=>{if(actionStack.current.length===0)return;// Move the last action(s) to the undone stack

socket.emit('undo');};const redo=()=>{if(undoneStack.current.length===0)return;// Restore actions from the undone stack
let action=undoneStack.current.pop();actionStack.current.push(action);if(action.type==='begin'){// Add actions until the next 'begin' or stack is empty

socket.emit('redo');};const onUndoEvent=()=>{if(actionStack.current.length===0)return;// Move the last action(s) to the undone stack
